lead_paragraph: The director of “Waitress,” a Tony-nominated musical, lives with her family in a townhouse on the Upper West Side.

headline.main: At Home With Broadway’s Diane Paulus

snippet: The director of “Waitress,” a Tony-nominated musical, lives with her family in a townhouse on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Tony Award-winning theater director Diane Paulus loves her Upper West Side rental townhouse, which she shares with husband Randy Weiner and their daughters; says spacious home has allowed her to collaborate easily on professional projects, with plenty of room for family activities and mementos.
